reviews.review:
Have been playing the Counter-Strike series, on and off for years (since beta 6).

Generally it has always bettered itself, however the same cant be said for me . . . as I still cant hit the broadside of a barn.

None the less its still a fun game to have the odd couple of rounds of when I get a few minutes here and there.

Gra jest po prostu świetna, fajnie sie gra i jest miła atmosfera na serwerach. Normalnie az sie chce w nią grac :D
Polecam ta gre każdemy :D
ненавижу эту игру. это худшее что есть в моей жизни. удалите мне ее с аккаунта кто нибудь
Збс игра.Экономлю на школьной жрачке,что бы купить скины в кс.Ёбаный стыд :D
good game but crappy ranking system
How can you not own this game...
As ever other reviewer of CSGO. so much hours, so little money.
Enjoyable game but in general matchmaking people can be toxic taking the enojyment out of the game. If toxic people are nto present the game is fun to play particularly with friends.

Woll der Kot!

Dieses Spiel ist eines meines Lieblingsspiele!
